official_title: A bill to amend the Act of June 25, 1910, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to implement measures to control floods on the lower Cowlitz River area.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to implement and maintain flood control measures on the Cowlitz and Toutle Rivers, Washington.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of June 25, 1910, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to implement measures to control floods on the lower Cowlitz River area.
